Tremor landed on an island after hearing some shots.  After 
trudging through some dense forest he came to a clearing, the 
Autobot ship sitting in the middle, and to the side, 2 no 3 maxi's.  
But there was Slugslinger, and fighting like a madbot possessed 
by Unitron itself.  Looking and seeing Slugslinger taking care of 
Cliffjumper, he turned his attention to Torca.  Aiming Tiptop at him 
he pulled the trigger of the bioengineed nebulan, who was binary-
bonded to Tremor to transform into his weapon.  His weapon mode 
a a gyroscopic destabilizer that would cause whoever it hit to lose 
thier balance.
